mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_video ( name, path, reg_user, reg_date, mod_date ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{path}, #{regUser}, now(), now() )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) cnt FROM tb_video tv LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_user tu ON tv.reg_user = tu.id LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_category tc ON tv.category = tc.id WHERE tv.public_yn = 1

SELECT tv.id, tv.name, tv.notes, tv.path, tv.thumbnail, tv.public_yn, tv.reg_date, tv.mod_date, tu.id user_id, tu.thumbnail_yn reg_user_thumbnail_yn, tu.display_name, tc.category_name FROM tb_video tv LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_user tu ON tv.reg_user = tu.id LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_category tc ON tv.category = tc.id WHERE tv.public_yn = 1 ORDER BY tv.reg_date DESC LIMIT #{firstIndex}, #{dataPerPage}
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_video SET name = #{name}, notes = #{notes}, thumbnail = #{thumbnail}, category = #{category}, public_yn = #{public_yn.ordinal}, mod_date = now() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT tv.id, tv.name, tv.notes, tv.path, tv.thumbnail, tv.public_yn, tv.reg_date, tv.mod_date, tu.id user_id, tu.thumbnail_yn reg_user_thumbnail_yn, tu.display_name, tc.category_name FROM tb_video tv LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_user tu ON tv.reg_user = tu.id LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_category tc ON tv.category = tc.id WHERE tv.id = #{id}
